page.title: 13A Day in the School Term
page.content: My mother wakes me at 7 am and I go downstairs, tidy up and have my breakfast. I listen to the radio until about 7.40am when I go upstairs into the bathroom and wash my face and brush my teeth. I get dressed in my school uniform which is a navy blue skirt and jumper and a white blouse and school tie.At 8.10, I go to the bus stop. When I get to school, I meet my friends and register in my form room. At 9.25am, I go to my first lesson.Lessons last about 40-45 mins and I learn Maths, English, French, Humanities, P.E., Science, Music, Art Home Economics,and Design. I have two lessons, then a break, two more lessons and then an hour for lunch. There are three lessons in the afternoon. School finishes at 3.45 and I go home on the bus. I do my homework in the evening. Louise Page 12 yrs
